ygData.subject: Re: Our class
ygData.msgSnippet: These spells teleport the caster only to those specified locations, I believe that they take you to those triangular pillar formations that are located in the
ygData.messageBody:
These spells teleport the caster only to those specified locations, I
believe that they take you to those triangular pillar formations that are
located in the various zones but only being 15 means I have never tested
this.

Yours,

~Aereuss Ravins of Tarew Marr

-----Original Message-----
From: Ken Lee [mailto:kenlee@...]
Sent: Tuesday, April 20, 1999 2:39 PM
To: eq_wizards@onelist.com
Subject: [eq_wizards] Re: Our class

From: "Ken Lee" <kenlee@...>

Okay, I know it's Gate tox,north, and something. Where
exactly do these gate
you?

Toxxulia I suppose
North Queynos ??
Felwithe ?!

Zalbar
14th Wizard
Solusek Ro

>
>Talarin, High Elven Wizard
